title: What champions do you play when you are getting camped game after game?
body: As of the past two days, every game I have been camped. I'm not talking the jungler frequently comes to the lane I'm in. I'm talking the enemy jungler sits in a warded bush for 60+ seconds waiting for me to slightly come out of turret range. Every 30 seconds he shows his face in lane. So, what champions do you play when game after game the jungler spends 80% of his time trying to gank you?

replies.body: How is this a problem?  That jungler will fall behind very quickly.  Just farm under tower and try to set up a freeze. Free game basically, 4v5.

Not really.

Junglers can literally spend the whole game ganking and barely fall behind.

This season is pretty much determined by who has the better jungler.

Dépends. If you're the type of dude  that flame in the  all chat,no wonder you get  camped everytime. If it's not the  case,you must be a pain in the  ass for the  jungler:either have a tanky champ with CC or a High mobility champ. Unless in premade,a jungler won't come  to a lane that is hard to camp. You can  also carry a game if the  jungler camps you:it consists of not dying,warding without him knowing so you give  him hopes about ganking you.don't let him know that you warded by landing a skillshot,just overextend a little so he  can  waste his time  so your jungler can  gank otherlanes/countergank

Katarina in the mid lane. That's why I play her top lane. But it's not JUST the enemy jungler that stays nearby always, any chance the support gets a chance he comes, same for top lane and ADC. It's so frustrating. That's why I play her top so they can only have 2 people come into my lane and if the jungler camps me he at least has to stay on one side of the map =p

When I'm supporting, Tahm Kench is pretty good for keeping bot lane safe from frequent ganks. Top lane, most of my mains do well against camping. Cho'Gath has enough tankiness and sustain to survive, Renekton can usually 2v1, and Sion can tank and CC to make his escape.
